title: Restaurants in Haryana can operate 24x7; move to give city night life a boost
description: “We have been advocating to various state governments on the need to have restaurants that serve 24x7, since a vibrant nightlife economy makes cities safer,” Rahul Singh, Trustee of the National Restaurant Association of India (NRAI), which represents over 5 lakh members, said.
